name: 郭儀風
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
Week 1  Rome wasn't built in a day.
Week 2  How to improve your English.
Week 3  The City of song.
Week 4  He who hesitates is lost.
Week 5  Review 1 to 3
Week 6  Bungee Jumping.
Week 7  Npthing venture, nothing gained.
Week 8  Doctor death
Week 9  Review 5 to 8.
Week 10  No hearts or no brains.
Week 11  Be thoughtful.
Week 12  What are friends are for.
Week 13  Power without pollution.
Week 14  Review 10 to 13.
Week 15  Stop the noise  
Week 16  Health cpmes first
Week 17  Quit cold turkey turkey
Week 18  Final
scorePolicy:
平時30%
期中30%
期末40%
